fee_codes.description: Basic fee-per-visit premium for procedures marked (+)
fee_codes.conditions: Not eligible for payment for a service provided in a hospital. Not eligible for payment when the service marked with (+) is not eligible for payment.

rules: Services listed in the Diagnostic and Therapeutic Procedures Section are eligible for payment in addition to a consultation or assessment except where they are specifically listed as included in consultation or assessment services.
When a procedure(s) is the sole reason for a visit, add G700 for those procedures marked (+) regardless of the number of procedures carried out during that visit.
notes: If a patient presents for an allergy injection and has an acute infectious condition, the physician is entitled to claim the appropriate assessment fee as well as the injection fee.
If a patient requires a brief assessment of his allergic condition as well as the allergy injection, the physician should claim the injection and the basic fee.
